quest.name: There's No Clean Like Qhoterl Clean
journal:
Qhoterl Pasol is worrying her fingers over a dusty tablet.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the requested supplies to Qhoterl Pasol.
objectives: Mine splendid gravel at Mjrl's RegretDeliver the splendid gravel to Qhoterl PasolGather bundles of splendid broombush at Mjrl's RegretDeliver the bundles of splendid broombush to Qhoterl PasolCatch a splendid pipira at the LozatlDeliver the splendid pipira to Qhoterl Pasol.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: These stone tablets are among the Stewards' most revered relics. However, nature holds a somewhat less sentimental view of them, and so it falls to us to keep the elements from diminishing their splendor.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: If we wish for our children and our children's children to look upon the stones with the same sense of awe that we do now, we must have tools to maintain them. If you would aid me in crafting such instruments, I would be forever in your debt.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Polishing the tablets with gravel would ensure that their luster never fades. I'm informed that you can find it strewn about Mjrl's Regret.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Fallen leaves and dust must be cleared away diligently, or soon the tablets would be swallowed by nature's detritus. With broombush from Mjrl's Regret to sweep the dust away, this daily chore should go by all the quicker.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: The tablets must be scoured regularly, lest their sheen wane and they become indistinguishable from a common slab of rock. The hard scales of the pipira─quite common in the Lozatl─are well suited to this task. Don't forget to take fruit worms!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Whether it be on the morrow or one thousand summers from now, I wish to see every tablet as radiant as the histories contained within. Gravel mined from Mjrl's Regret should help us achieve this goal.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Nature's castoffs would bury us all if left unchecked. Broombush from Mjrl's Regret should aid us in staving off this constant threat.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: To keep the tablets immaculate for generations, we must scour them regularly. Pipira from the Lozatl possess scales that will endure this task for moons to come.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: You have the look of someone who's been gathering to herhis heart's content! Please tell me you managed to procure the materials I asked for in your fervor.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: I knew I was right to count on you! My days of late have been filled with sweeping, polishing, and generally worrying over the condition of the tablets. I daresay these new materials will allow me to speed through my chores!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Finally I'll have time to rest my aching knees and throbbing wrists. This work is taxing, 'tis true, but the thought of my ancestors enjoying the fruits of my labor─our labor─makes it all worthwhile.
